name: Jurassic Park Motion
overview:
Jurassic Park: Arcade is a 3D lightgun shooter played from a first-person perspective based on the Jurassic Park franchise. A volcano has erupted on Isla Nublar leaving the island the park stands on unstable. The player is part of a team send to track down and capture several dinosaur species.

The game offers a total of nine stages and three bosses: a Triceratops, Tyrannosaurus and Spinosaurus. While playing the player has to gun down over thirty different enemies. A total of five different weapons can be used while playing. These are the X-22 Renegade, Titan 2000, Shockbolt, Frostbite cannon and Triple Threat. The game can be played solo or with a friend.
